metadata.title: Memory Loss Fidget & Sensory Pad
features: GREAT FOR SENIORS WITH ALZHEIMER'S that need extra stimulation! Enables ‘Busy Hands’ to Stay Busy
HELPS RELIEVE BOREDOM! Provides a variety of fun activities and tactile sensations
Features lacing, buckling and zipping activities. Keeping busy helps reduce loneliness
Flip-and-feel assortment of fabrics and ribbons. Overall size: 24" x 12. Machine washable.
HELPS CARETAKERS KEEP SENIORS ACTIVE & BUSY!
description: Fidget Pads can be a SOOTHING SOLUTION TO THE RESTLESSNESS, FIDGETING & ANXIETY that often comes with ALZHEIMER’S and DEMENTIA. This FIDGET SENSORY ACTIVITY PAD has been developed for those that are soothed by something to do with their restless hands, a symptom common with Alzheimer's, Dementia (and Autism) patients. Multiple benefits include EXERCISING HANDS & FINGERS / STIMULATING THE BRAIN with colors & various GADGETS & TEXTURES / Alleviating Boredom/ Keeping fidgety hands busy. MENTALLY STIMULATING ACTIVITIES for Seniors may help families & caregivers get through the difficult times of the day.
